title: 11.5 p Land for sale at Kohuwala
details:
11.5P Land for Sale in Kohuwala
11.5 p land . Contains solid old house. 20ft wide road . Just 50 meters to Main road. Excellent location and highly residential area. Price quoted for Land value. Please make appointment for inspection. Strictly no brokers.
Easy access to leading Government and International Schools, Hospitals, Medical Centres, Banks, Restaurants and Supermarkets.50m to Dutugemunu Street; 400m to Hospital road /Anderson road; 800m to Kohuwala. Strictly no brokers.
5.2 Mill per perch.(60 Mill )
Mr Ranasinghe – 0773481977
